display_long_description:
Exercise the mind, body & soul in this fast-paced feast of micro challenges, high intensity boss battles and a concoction of collectibles that unravel as you jog across vibrant backdrops of color and joy.

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

[media]


# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

[media]


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

[media]


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

[media]


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

[media]


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

[media]

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE

# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/86659801_2932247743583077_7417664589811237837_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=VOnD6X-jp_AQ7kNvwEXkaDL&_nc_oc=AdnJhg186J8msCFzW10kKHwAMUHsgPl4F0TN3VsS0AkDGxpb7dminQ9k53BR5PYDlFI&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfuxTA6eLnsWsmODGhgXTZx3cKaF3qfm27txhzVoQJU8iA&oe=69964CEA)


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

![{"height":984,"type":"image","width":1748}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507165_447221264980420_8367178254206728213_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=GKlqCh1KJIQQ7kNvwGX0eLk&_nc_oc=Adl0Eo2n67a2LJsO8ppf380sn_dqY62AZLOd1fxBC8z3U8kfcXcLcRJjifWxO9nDJl4&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_Afsg26f1XSs67RT4mWN2F0DaY4PxYB2Yjk7_RrDxt0f__Q&oe=69963D52)


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57570293_4078635569072597_4548948488473550523_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=AJYm28CidlcQ7kNvwE1C8-2&_nc_oc=AdnVfjuFHxEyc3QHGUxBh0ubuJiyNpCSmWO8SFBf6-KrtfD4z__SOaXHuqx3wwXOuRQ&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfvC9ZqXWeCYGYpqWrNT_1qs5imS3Aui5n5pwJ8p6w3hCA&oe=6996442D)


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982723_2208705096178691_3774754884521119372_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=jx2g4EVm5ZcQ7kNvwF8wcIt&_nc_oc=Adl6MiB5s4VzyjJ8kbLa1WZAIRVwu1YQRvbe-UYMWjII-E6FSmgod67I8scJuARpOdk&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfsGzlUphbKcYGJv6CRnfuzz_5tt-fvk7VKTl4J8E94VzQ&oe=69962050)


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.
